course_title: Fresh Sem: Poli Sci: The 2022 Midterm Election
class_notes:
(Freshmen Seminar - Limited to First Year Students Only)
(Complete Topic: The 2022 Midterm Election and the Future of American Politics)
This seminar will examine the outlook for the 2022 midterm elections in the United States.  We will cover changes in the American party system and the American electorate over the past several decades including the rise of partisan polarization, the results of the 2020 presidential and congressional elections, the aftermath of the Trump presidency and the January 6, 2021 insurrection, the Biden presidency, congressional redistricting the 2022 congressional primaries.  Students will conduct independent research on selected topics related to the 2022 midterm elections and prepare class presentations and papers based on their research.
course_description: For first-year students only. Entry level seminar focusing on a specific topic. May be repeated for credit when topic varies.
